For our final class, we will focus on how to communicate the results of your analyses to others. We will look at strategies for giving effective presentations / speeches as well as best practices for designing slides.

To get started, open up a notebook (physical, digital...whatever you take notes in best), and **take notes** while you watch [this short video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w82a1FT5o88) on how to start a speech:
